item.title: Open PostDoc and PhD positions - EXPIRED
item.description: Join the lab! PostDoc and PhD position offered. UPDATE: Both positions are filled in.

item.title: PhD-position - EXPIRED
item.description: PhD position - EXPIRED We are currently seeking a PhD student (m/f/d)** in the field of “Machine learning / Deep learning for Neuroimaging”

item.title: The PNI junior research group is just about to start!
item.description: *** We are hiring! Read for more info! *** We are pleased to announce that our new junior research group - the Predictive NeuroImaging Lab - is about to start.
